name: Award Winning Chili Con Carne
author: CHEFJIMMY
summary: This chili recipe is many years in the making and I have won several awards with it. I think you'll be pleased with it. You can alter it to your own spice levels to achieve your perfect chili. Garnish with shredded mozzarella cheese, and use corn chips for dipping.
ingredients: 2 (16 ounce) cans whole peeled tomatoes, chopped, juice reserved
directions: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat
Cook green pepper, and onion, until softened
Add the ground beef and cook until browned
Crumble over bouillon cubes, and stir in wine; continue to cook for a few minutes
Stir in chopped tomatoes, garlic, and tomato paste
Season with paprika, chili powder, cayenne pepper, basil, oregano, and parsley
Bring to a boil over high heat
Cover, and simmer for 90 minutes, stirring occasionally
Stir in  kidney beans, and hot pepper sauce
You can add the reserved tomato juice if more liquid is needed
Continue to simmer for an additional 30 minutes
In a small bowl, whisk together the flour, corn meal, and water until smooth
Stir into chili, and cook for a further 10 minutes, or until chili has thickened up
